council_profile.political_control: Labour majority (21 seats: 15 Labour + 6 Labour & Co-op). Conservative opposition (12 seats).
council_profile.note: Longest dataset (9 years) and lowest threshold (£250) of the 3 councils — more granular data.

data_quality.note: Best data quality of the 3 councils. Full descriptions enable genuine accountability.

ch_breach_spend.note: Highest breach spend of the 3 councils. B3P, JDS and Homewise account for £866K with no registered directors — genuine governance concern.

year_end_pattern.note: March is actually the LOWEST spending month. July is the peak. No year-end budget rush.

micro_transactions.note: 2,422 individual £5 Land Registry searches. Legitimate but could be consolidated.

lancashire_cc.note: County-level service payments — largest line item

specialist_fleet.note: Multiple vehicle hire contracts flagged as duplicates — actually separate vehicles

cross_council_context.data_advantage: Hyndburn's longer dataset (2017-present) and lower threshold (£250) provides the most complete picture of spending patterns.
